headline: PNC Bank, N.A. Changes Prime Rate
summary: PNC Bank, N.A. announced a decrease in its prime lending rate. The new rate of 7.00% is effective tomorrow, Oct. 30, 2025.

raw.headline: PNC Bank, N.A. Changes Prime Rate

headline: Post Q3, Which Bank Has the Edge: Bank of America or PNC Financial?
summary: Does BAC's scale and digital edge go up against PNC's disciplined growth and rich dividends in a post-Q3 showdown? Let's decode.

headline: PNC Financial Services Group (PNC): Examining Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) recently closed at $182.84. The week ended with a slight decline in its shares, down 1% in the past day, while the month-to-date performance reflects a 10% drop. See our latest analysis for PNC Financial Services Group. After a sharp pullback this month, PNC Financial Services Group is still holding up reasonably well in the big picture. The 1-year total shareholder return is just under 1%, and the 3- and 5-year totals of 27.5% and 83.4% respectively show...
